thread.section_title: White Mountain Puzzles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of White Mountain Puzzles | whitemountainpuzzles.com
thread.title: Paul Dickerson
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Paul Dickerson

author: Paul Dickerson
title: Paul Dickerson
text:
After completing my first White Mountain puzzle, I checked out your website and was amazed at the selection. Naturally I've placed two orders since then. I've done puzzles from other companies and the White Mountain ones are the best. The only thing better than finishing a puzzle is immediately starting a new one.
Thank you !
